name: Hijack Helpline
description:
Stop a runaway train disaster... over the phone

My entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme is "Out of Control".

You are a new starter at Hijack Helpline, a call centre that deals with train hijackings. A new call has come in, and everyone in the office is out to lunch - looks like you're going to have to deal with it!

Try and get aquainted with the tools and information at your disposal - an operating manual, a train track map and a train timetable - on the job while you are on the phone to a brave passenger who has taken it upon themselves to take control of the runaway train.

Note: if you fail and decide to try again, the train may start in a different location on the map!

Uses UI sounds from ObsydianX's Interface SFX Pack 1: https://obsydianx.itch.io/interface-sfx-pack-1
